synopsis.text: After her mother's remarriage, high school fashionista Yuzu Aihara finds herself transferred to a rigid all-girls school, far from her dreams of finding her first love and making new friends. On her first day, she crosses paths with the stern and beautiful student council president, Mei, who becomes her nemesis. But the plot thickens when Yuzu discovers that Mei is not just her new classmate, but also her stepsister. As they begin living under the same roof, an unexpected kiss from Mei leaves Yuzu confused and questioning her feelings. Despite their contrasting personalities, Yuzu finds herself drawn to Mei, determined to uncover the secrets behind her cold exterior and heal her hidden pain. As they navigate their newfound relationship, Yuzu must balance her growing affection for Mei with the challenges of their shared living situation. Will Yuzu be able to melt Mei's icy demeanor and find love in the most unexpected place?
